pages.text: A simple and useful item, lets you store unstackable books, including Books and Quills, Written Books, Spellbooks, Enchanted Books and Patchouli Guide Books.$(br)Shift-Right-Click to access the menu, where shift-clicking can move books to/from the bundle, and clicking will allow you to directly read the book's contents. Simply right-clicking will open the last book you read.
PS: Due to technical limitations, Books and Quills will use the Written Book UI. Written Books will appear as though they are in Lecterns for the same reason.
